languages.text: Похоже, дальние атаки по кораблям друкари не так эффективны — все дело в Теневом поле, что окружает вражеские суда! Смените тактику боя и попробуйте атаковать их вблизи — так вы нанесете больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и сможете сокрушить врага. Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}очередности{/g} слева, выберите вражеский корабль и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы узнать, как работают его пассивные способности.

traits.locale_text:
Похоже, дальние атаки по кораблям друкари не так эффективны — все дело в Теневом поле, что окружает вражеские суда! Смените тактику боя и попробуйте атаковать их вблизи — так вы нанесете больше урона и сможете сокрушить врага.
Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель инициативы слева, выберите вражеский корабль и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы узнать, как работают его пассивные способности.

languages.text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.
languages.original_text: Похоже, дальние атаки по кораблям друкари не так эффективны — все дело в Теневом поле, что окружает вражеские суда! Смените тактику боя и попробуйте атаковать их вблизи — так вы нанесете больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} и сможете сокрушить врага. Нажмите {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, чтобы активировать панель {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}очередности{/g} слева, выберите вражеский корабль и нажмите {console_bind|Confirm}, чтобы узнать, как работают его пассивные способности.

traits.locale_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more damage and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more damage and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the initiative panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effective{/g} due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

languages.text: 黑暗灵族的舰船藏身于暗影领域之中。因此，远距离开火的命中率并不理想。您可以尝试改变战术，近距离攻击他们的舰船。这样一来，您便可以造成更多{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，将敌人碾为齑粉。按下{console_bind|LeftStickButton}即可打开左侧的{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}行动顺序{/g}面板。选择任意敌舰，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}，即可了解敌舰被动能力的详细信息。
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗灵族的舰船藏身于暗影领域之中。因此，远距离开火的命中率并不理想。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}您可以尝试改变战术，近距离攻击他们的舰船。这样一来，您便可以造成更多伤害，将敌人碾为齑粉。 按下{console_bind|LeftStickButton}即可打开左侧的行动顺序面板。选择任意敌舰，之后按下{console_bind|Confirm}，即可了解敌舰被动{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的详细信息。

languages.text: デュカーリ艦への長距離攻撃は、艦周辺に巡らされたシャドウフィールドに阻まれるため、効果は薄い。至近距離から攻撃するなど、戦術を変えてみよう 。そうすればより多くの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、敵を粉砕することができる。 {console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押して左側の{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}優先度{/g}パネルを起動し、敵の戦艦を選択しよう。{console_bind|Confirm}を押すとパッシブアビリティがどのように作用するか確認できる。
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリ艦への長{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距離{/g}攻撃は、艦周辺に巡らされたシャドウフィールドに阻まれる。効果は薄い。至近距離から攻撃するなど、戦術を変えてみよう 。そうすればより多くのダメージを与え、敵を粉砕することができる。 {console_bind|LeftStickButton}を押して左側のイニシアチブパネルを起動し、敵の戦艦を選択しよう。{console_bind|Confirm}を押すとパッシブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}がどのように作用するか確認できる。

languages.text: Los ataques de largo alcance contra naves Drukhari son menos efectivos debido al Campo de sombra que los envuelve. Prueba a cambiar de táctica atacándolos desde cerca: causarás más {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y te será más fácil vencer al enemigo. Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el panel de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}prioridad{/g} a la izquierda, selecciona una nave enemiga y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} para obtener información sobre sus capacidades pasivas.
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de largo {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} contra naves Drukhari son menos efectivos debido al Campo de sombra que los envuelve. Prueba a cambiar de táctica atacándolos desde cerca. Causarás más daño y te será más fácil vencer al enemigo. Pulsa {console_bind|LeftStickButton} para activar el panel de iniciativa a la izquierda, selecciona una nave enemiga y pulsa {console_bind|Confirm} para obtener información sobre sus {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} pasivas.

languages.text: Fernangriffe gegen Drukhari-Schiffe sind wegen des Schattenfeldes, das sie umgibt, weniger effektiv. Versuche, deine Taktik zu ändern, indem du sie aus der Nähe angreifst – so kannst du mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} anrichten und den Feind vernichten. Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um das {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}Priorität{/g}-Fenster der linken Seite zu aktivieren, wähle ein feindliches Schiff aus und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um zu erfahren, wie seine passiven Fähigkeiten funktionieren.
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernangriffe{/g} gegen Drukhari-Schiffe sind wegen des Schattenfeldes, das sie umgibt, weniger effektiv. Versuche, deine Taktik zu ändern, indem du sie aus der Nähe angreifst — so kannst du mehr Schaden anrichten und den Feind vernichten. Drücke {console_bind|LeftStickButton}, um das Initiativfeld auf der linken Seite zu aktivieren, wähle ein feindliches Schiff aus und drücke {console_bind|Confirm}, um zu erfahren, wie seine passiven {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} funktionieren.

languages.text: Les attaques longue portée contre les vaisseaux drukharis sont moins efficaces en raison du Champ d'ombres qui les enveloppe. Essayez de changer de tactique en les attaquant à bout portant. Vous pourrez ainsi infliger plus de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et écraser l'ennemi. Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le panneau de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priorité{/g} de gauche, sélectionnez un vaisseau ennemi et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour prendre connaissance de ses capacités passives.
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques longue {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} contre les vaisseaux Drukhari sont moins efficaces en raison du Champ d'Ombres qui les enveloppe. Essayez de changer de tactique en les attaquant à bout portant. Vous pourrez ainsi infliger plus de dégâts et écraser l'ennemi. Appuyez sur {console_bind|LeftStickButton} pour activer le panneau d'initiative de gauche, sélectionnez un vaisseau ennemi et appuyez sur {console_bind|Confirm} pour connaître le fonctionnement de ses {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} passives.

languages.text: Drukhari gemilerine yapılan uzun menzilli saldırılar, gemileri çevreleyen Gölge Alanı'ndan dolayı daha az etkilidir. Taktiğini değiştirerek onlara yakın menzilden saldırmayı dene. Böylece daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} vererek düşmanı ezip geçebilirsin. Soldaki {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}öncelik{/g} panelini etkinleştirmek için {console_bind|LeftStickButton} düğmesine bas. Bir düşman gemisi seç ve pasif kabiliyetlerinin nasıl işlediğini öğrenmek için {console_bind|Confirm} düğmesine bas.
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. Press {console_bind|LeftStickButton} to activate the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel on the left, select an enemy ship, and press {console_bind|Confirm} to learn how its passive abilities work.
